item.title: 得克萨斯州通过苹果公司首席执行官反对的在线儿童安全法案
item.description: 得克萨斯州州长格雷格-阿博特（Greg Abbott）签署了一项在线儿童安全法案，抵制了大型科技公司的游说，包括苹果公司（Apple Inc.首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）亲自打来电话。【原文：Texas Governor Greg Abbott signed an online child safety bill, bucking a lobbying push from big tech companies that included a personal phone call from from Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook.】

item.title: 当无所事事得到回报时
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 纳格尔称关税驱动的前置负荷有助于在年初提振德国经济
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，德国第一季度产出数据上调的主要原因是企业和出口商试图提前应对美国的关税预期。【原文：The upgrade of Germany’s first-quarter output numbers is primarily due to businesses and exporters attempting to get ahead of expected US tariffs, according to Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 赞比亚将继续拖欠非金银行债务直至债务重组
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长西坦贝科-穆索科特瓦内（Situmbeko Musokotwane）表示，赞比亚将与包括非洲进出口银行在内的地区贷款机构进行债务重组，在重组进程完成之前，赞比亚仍将拖欠这些贷款。【原文：Zambia will restructure its debt with regional lenders including the African Export-Import Bank and remain in default on those payments until the process is completed, Finance Minister Situmbeko Musokotwane said.】

item.title: 政府开始审查，BBVA 的萨瓦德尔竞购进一步推迟
item.description: 西班牙政府决定对 BBVA SA 收购竞争对手萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）的交易进行审查，此前西班牙反垄断监管机构上个月批准了该收购交易，但附带了一些条件。【原文：Spain’s government decided to conduct its own review of BBVA SA’s bid for rival Banco Sabadell SA, after the country’s antitrust watchdog last month cleared the offer with some conditions.】

item.title: 几内亚在最新一轮清除行动中收回奋进者黄金许可证
item.description: 几内亚撤销了奋进矿业公司（Endeavour Mining Plc）的四个黄金勘探许可证，因为该公司正在继续收回不活跃和不合规的采矿权。【原文：Guinea has revoked four gold exploration permits from Endeavour Mining Plc as it continues to reclaim inactive and non-compliant mining rights.】

item.title: 高通公司发布研究报告，显示其调制解调器击败苹果公司的 C1
item.description: 高通公司委托进行的一项研究发现，高通公司的调制解调器芯片比苹果公司开发的竞争对手的元件更好用，尤其是对密集城区的蜂窝电话用户而言。【原文：A study commissioned by Qualcomm Inc. found that its modem chips worked better than a rival component developed by Apple Inc., especially for cellular customers in dense urban areas.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行接近实现通胀目标
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧洲央行已接近实现其 2% 的通胀目标，但不确定性的增加使其无法预测未来的利率走势，因此需要最大限度的灵活性。【原文：The European Central Bank is close to hitting its 2% inflation goal, but elevated uncertainty makes it impossible to predict future interest-rate moves and requires maximum flexibility, Governing Council member Joachim Nagel said.】

item.title: 墨西哥股市创纪录，关税缓解提振风险资产
item.description: 受解放日后反弹的提振，墨西哥股市周二飙升至历史新高，并追随拉美股市更广泛的涨势。【原文：Mexican stocks surged to an all-time high on Tuesday, buoyed by a post-Liberation Day bounce and tracking a broader rally in Latin American equities.】

item.title: Meta 推出 iPad 版 WhatsApp，向平板电脑用户作出迟来的让步
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc. 旗下的 WhatsApp 发布了其流行信息应用程序的 iPad 专用版本，姗姗来迟地为使用苹果公司平板电脑的用户提供了更大尺寸的体验。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc.’s WhatsApp released an iPad-specific version of its popular messaging app, belatedly offering a larger-format experience to users with Apple Inc. tablets.】

item.title: BAT 将出售 13.6 亿美元的印度烟草制造商 ITC 股份
item.description: 英美烟草公司（British American Tobacco Plc）计划出售印度烟草制造商 ITC Ltd 的股份，价值至少 13.6 亿美元。【原文：British American Tobacco Plc plans to sell a stake in Indian tobacco manufacturer ITC Ltd worth at least $1.36 billion.】

item.title: 海湾地区最小的石油生产商在供应充足的情况下寻求进口液化天然气
item.description: 巴林是波斯湾最小的石油生产国，据其国家能源公司的老板称，由于市场供应充足，巴林正在寻求液化天然气进口并考虑长期交易。【原文：Bahrain, the smallest oil producer in the Persian Gulf, is seeking liquefied natural gas imports and considering long-term deals as the market appears well supplied, according to the boss of its state energy company.】

item.title: 英国通胀为何居高不下且难以下降
item.description: 尽管大流行病后的通胀在发达国家的大部分地区有所缓解，但英国仍然是西方主要经济体中物价增长最快的国家。【原文：While a post-pandemic burst of inflation has abated across much of the developed world, Britain is still stuck with the highest price growth among big western economies.】

item.title: DoorDash 疯狂交易后寻求发行 20 亿美元可转换债券
item.description: DoorDash 公司正在通过出售可转换债券筹集 20 亿美元资金，而在此之前不到一个月，这家美国最大的食品配送服务公司宣布了两笔规模可观的交易，以扩大其全球业务范围。【原文：DoorDash Inc. is raising $2 billion from the sale of convertible bonds, less than a month after the US’ largest food-delivery service announced a pair of sizable deals to expand its global footprint.】

item.title: 财政部削减票据销售规模，债务上限压力骤增
item.description: 美国财政部削减了为期四周和八周的账单拍卖规模，这可能是一系列削减的开始，因为政府正在寻求保持法定债务上限下的借贷权力。【原文：The US Treasury Department cut the size of its four- and eight-week bill auctions, the beginning of what’s likely to be a series of reductions as the government seeks to preserve its borrowing authority under the statutory debt ceiling.】

item.title: Blackstone 从纽约养老金购买 50 亿美元 PE 股权
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 同意从纽约市养老金系统购买 50 亿美元的私募股权投资持股，这是同类销售中最大的一笔。【原文：Blackstone Inc. agreed to buy $5 billion of private equity holdings from the New York City pension system, one of the largest sales of its kind.】

item.title: 华尔街无法打败迈克尔-赛勒失控的加密引擎
item.description: 华尔街不断发明新的方法来搭乘数字货币热潮的顺风车；从增强型 ETF 和代币化基金到结构性产品；加密货币的竞争者也在不断盘旋。但是，迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的交易仍能带来最大的回报。【原文：Wall Street keeps inventing new ways to ride the digital-currency boom — from amped-up ETFs and tokenized funds to structured products — and crypto competitors keep circling. But the trade still delivering the biggest rewards belongs to Michael Saylor.】

item.title: 新推出的 ETF 基金抵消了先锋效应，费用创下历史新高
item.description: 杰克-博格尔（Jack Bogle）可能曾设想过一个费用低至最低、指数基金令人昏昏欲睡的世界；但2025年的ETF市场看起来更像是一个投机商场，而不是一个削减成本的乌托邦。【原文：Jack Bogle may have envisioned a world of rock-bottom fees and sleepy index funds — but the ETF market in 2025 looks more like a speculative arcade than a cost-cutting utopia.】

item.title: 加拿大铝贸易商将破产归咎于贸易战
item.description: 一直在努力重组债务的加拿大铝贸易商已在美国和加拿大申请破产，称美国的贸易战助长了公司的边缘化。【原文：A Canadian aluminum trader that had been struggling to restructure its debt has filed bankruptcy in the US and Canada, saying the American trade war helped push the company over the edge.】

item.title: 印度将美国贸易协议视为降低外部风险的关键
item.description: 在印度政府寻求加快谈判并达成临时协议之际，这个南亚国家表示，与美国达成一项成功的贸易协议将有助于印度缓解外部风险并促进其出口。【原文：A successful trade deal with the US could help India mitigate external risks and boost its exports, the South Asian country said, as its government seeks to speed up talks and reach an interim agreement.】

item.title: 阿格尼科-伊格尔跃升为最有价值黄金股，令保尔森倍感振奋
item.description: 2008 年金融危机后，亿万富翁对冲基金经理约翰-保尔森（John Paulson）的公司大举押注黄金，他的基金挑选了几家中小型金矿公司。其中一家现在正在争夺世界上最有价值的金矿股票。【原文：When billionaire hedge fund manager John Paulson’s firm made a big bet on gold after the 2008 financial crisis, his fund picked several small- and mid-size gold miners. One of those is now vying to be the world’s most valuable bullion stock.】

item.title: 据称 Neinor 对竞争对手西班牙开发商 Aedas 表示出兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Neinor Homes SA 有意收购竞争对手 Aedas Homes SA 的大量股份。【原文：Neinor Homes SA has shown interest in acquiring a significant stake in rival Aedas Homes SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 嘉能可在伦敦金属交易所买入俄罗斯铜，以满足中国市场的紧张需求
item.description: Glencore Plc 一直在伦敦金属交易所买入俄罗斯铜，并计划将其运往中国。【原文：Glencore Plc has been buying Russian copper on the London Metal Exchange and plans to deliver it into China, in a trade that highlights a squeeze on supplies in the world’s largest copper consumer.】

item.title: 贸易停战使美国消费者信心指数创四年来最大涨幅
item.description: 美国消费者信心指数在 5 月份从近五年的低点大幅反弹，原因是在关税休战的背景下，经济和劳动力市场的前景有所改善。【原文：US consumer confidence rebounded sharply in May from a near five-year low as the outlook for the economy and labor market improved amid a truce on tariffs.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金称企业在不确定性升高的情况下按兵不动
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）表示，不确定性的上升导致企业冻结招聘，并暂缓未来的投资决策。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Tom Barkin said elevated uncertainty has led businesses to freeze hiring and hold off on future investment decisions.】

item.title: 特朗普推迟对欧盟征收 50%关税，美国股市反弹
item.description: 周二上午，美国股市反弹，原因是美国和欧盟之间的贸易紧张局势出现降温迹象，以及有迹象表明日本在债券溃败后可能准备调整债务发行，从而导致全球收益率下降。【原文：US equities rallied on Tuesday morning as trade tensions between the US and the European Union showed signs of cooling and as yields fell globally on hints Japan may be prepared to adjust debt issuance after a bond rout there.】

item.title: 风险投资家帕利哈皮蒂亚购买亚利桑那州房产股份，押注数据中心建设
item.description: 风险投资家查马特-帕利哈皮蒂亚（Chamath Palihapitiya）正在投资亚利桑那州的一宗土地交易，他押注该地块可用于建设数据中心，因为它有可能获得 1,500 兆瓦的电力。【原文：Venture capitalist Chamath Palihapitiya is investing in an Arizona land deal, betting that the site could be used for data centers given its potential access to 1,500 megawatts of power.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体将筹集 25 亿美元资金购买比特币
item.description: Truth Social 背后的 Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. 公司表示，它计划出售约 15 亿美元的股票和 10 亿美元的 0% 可转换票据，以购买比特币作为其资金。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group Corp., the company behind Truth Social, said it plans to sell around $1.5 billion in stock and $1 billion in 0% convertible notes to buy Bitcoin for its treasury.】

item.title: 力拓铜矿因最高法院驳回阿帕奇人的上诉而得到推动
item.description: 美国最高法院为力拓集团（Rio Tinto Plc）建造北美最大的铜矿扫清了一大障碍，驳回了一个美国原住民组织的上诉，该组织称亚利桑那州的项目将破坏一个神圣的地区。【原文：The US Supreme Court cleared a major obstacle to Rio Tinto Plc’s construction of North America’s largest copper mine, rejecting an appeal by a Native American group that said the Arizona project will destroy a sacred area.】

item.title: 瓜子二手车认为人工智能开发支出增加将削弱利润率
item.description: 中国社交平台酷开科技（Kuaishou Technology）预计将在人工智能开发方面投入更多资金，以消除人们对其最新人工智能工具货币化乏力的担忧。【原文：Chinese social platform Kuaishou Technology expects to spend more on artificial intelligence development as it tries to dispel concerns about lackluster monetization of its latest AI tool.】
